oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Taylor Brothers Blacksmith shop and Cedar Grove Mill Company
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Photograph of the Taylor Brothers Blacksmith shop and the Cedar Grove Mill Company. Butler Holt is standing with his arm over a horse. Robert Taylor is standing and wearing a blacksmith apron. Joe Neal Taylor is shoeing a horse. Thomas L. Taylor is standing next to an automobile and wearing a blacksmith apron. Bud Franklin is standing next to an automobile and holding a basket. An unidentified child is sitting in the wagon on the left.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Looking Back at Tennessee Photograph Collection, 1890-1981
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Blacksmithing; Forge shops
